title: Eames Style Office Chair EA117 Leather
body: This classic office chair is designed back in 1950 and since then, the chair has become widely popular all over the world and has been used in various movies and television series. Depending on the weight of the user, the tilt mechanism can be adjusted to your comfort. Suits well weather at home or in the office, the Eames Office Chair EA117 Leather meets all the necessary requirements of a quality work environment. The most popular task chair in the private and public area. When Eames was designing this chair, he must have nothing in mind but comfort for the users.
